name: 60 Second Heroes
description:
Every 60 seconds, your hero changes between a fighter, rogue, and wizard. Use the powers of each to retrieve the treasure and undo the curse binding them all together.

Movement: WASD + Space

Left and Right Mouse Buttons for abilities. Wizard abilities need to be charged by holding down the button.

To switch between windowed and fullscreen, press Alt+Enter.

To (un)constrain the mouse cursor, press F.

MUSIC CREDITS:

"Adventure Meme" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
